sense.def:
Kdor je v enem položaju
rigidly
, se ne premakne.

seg.quote: My features stayed rigidly fixed in the same expression.

sense.def:
Kdor nekaj naredi
rigidly
, tisto naredi strogo po pravilih, brez možnosti različic ali sprememb.

seg.quote: These suggestions must not be interpreted too rigidly.
